# Http Docs

> Documentation for Http Docs.

*Topics available: 4*

- [HTTP support in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/http/http-overview.md): Learn about the comprehensive support for HTTP that .NET provides.
- [HttpClient guidelines for .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/http/httpclient-guidelines.md): Learn about using HttpClient instances to send HTTP requests and how you can manage clients using IHttpClientFactory in your .NET apps.
- [Migrate from HttpWebRequest](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/http/httpclient-migrate-from-httpwebrequest.md): Learn how to migrate from HttpWebRequest to HttpClient.
- [Make HTTP requests with the HttpClient](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/http/httpclient.md): Learn how to make HTTP requests and handle responses with the HttpClient in .NET.
